name: Happy Ball
description:
Controls
WASD to move
Left click to shoot
1-5 or scroll to select power up mode

Happy Ball is my Submission for Global Game Jam 2018,I worked on it with my brother. It's a first person puzzle game where you guide balls through different levels. you are also timed so that you can always try and improve.  

This game was actually voted the best game by the other attendees at our jam site.

I recommend you download the exe as some features may not work as intended in the browser
